channel.title: Excellence on Greg Herlein
channel.description: Recent content in Excellence on Greg Herlein

item.title: Foundations of High-Performance Engineering Teams
item.description: The US Navy gave me a solid foundation in leadership and operational excellence. But translating that into the business world requires a few more things.

item.title: Lessons from Admiral Rickover
item.description: Admiral Hyman Rickover (1900-1986), the “Father of the Nuclear Navy,” was controversial. He taught a whole generation of the best Engineers. Some of my thoughts on this.
